Reviews.Title: dont buy from this seller
Reviews.Author: arten
Reviews.Content: i bought used one for $554.99 it does not worth it. this seller never updated the shipping info. Later i wanted to return because i did not like the way it came to me.  it was wrapped with the paper. how can this seller disrespect $554. i filed the return claim he took about a week to get the return level. now  he said he will take $15 out of $554, but when i got my refund, just $517 was issued on by account. i am totally disappointed with the seller and the item he sold.

Reviews.Title: Love this iphone5!
Reviews.Author: magdalene boyett
Reviews.Content: Love this iPhone5! Light weight, easy to set up, great display features. Would highly recommend to any one who is not very technically savvy...The best ever!

Reviews.Title: Phone did not meet description as advertised.
Reviews.Author: Dominick Carillo
Reviews.Content: Phone did not meet description as advertised.Phone came in Black and was a gift for my spouse who wanted White as advertised.

Reviews.Title: liked the product!
Reviews.Author: sundeep.jada
Reviews.Content: The product was great and really it was new one!Absolutely new with cover and great price for the product..Thanks..:-)

Reviews.Title: not good
Reviews.Author: Xiaolong Guo
Reviews.Content: It has some scratches on the frame and it looks like it has been used for a few months. Not brand new.

Reviews.Title: Fast shipping
Reviews.Author: Arman
Reviews.Content: Fast shipping....I do not know if the phone works or not...I purchased for overseas use, and will take with me overseas and there buy the micro sim card and hopefully, the phone will work as listed...it certainly looked great.....like new....

Reviews.Title: Excelent
Reviews.Author: Milagros Sanchez
Reviews.Content: The phone is very good. i'm happy with this phone. Thanks. I don't have problem with the smartphone iPhone 5.

Reviews.Title: Iphone 5
Reviews.Author: Iman
Reviews.Content: The quality for this phone was amazing. It's so clean and perfect. I really like the phone. Thank you so much.
